mapper.sql: ID, NUM, PLAN_ID, MONEY, CTIME, TERM, OTHERS
mapper.insert: insert into invoice (ID, NUM, PLAN_ID, MONEY, CTIME, TERM, OTHERS) values (#{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{NUM,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PLAN_ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{MONEY,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{CTIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{TERM,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{OTHERS,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update invoice
NUM = #{NUM,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLAN_ID = #{PLAN_ID,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MONEY = #{MONEY,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
CTIME = #{CTIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TERM = #{TERM,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OTHERS = #{OTHERS,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
